pull.title: gitian-build.sh: fix signProg being recognized as two parameters
pull.body:
On current build script, `gpg --detach-sign` will be recognized as two parameters of gsign
This PR fix it and can build successfully

events.message: gitian-build.sh: fix signProg being recognized as two parameters

events.body: Could you please do the same to `doc/release-process.md`?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -272,7 +272,7 @@ then
 	    echo "Compiling ${VERSION} Linux"
 	    echo ""
 	    ./bin/gbuild -j ${proc} -m ${mem} --commit bitcoin=${COMMIT} --url bitcoin=${url} ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
-	    ./bin/gsign -p $signProg --signer $SIGNER --release ${VERSION}-linux --destination ../gitian.sigs/ ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
+	    ./bin/gsign -p "$signProg" --signer $SIGNER --release ${VERSION}-linux --destination ../gitian.sigs/ ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
comments.body: Would it make sense to do the same for all the other arguments? E.g. `"$SIGNER"` would make it possible to have signer names with spaces in them.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -272,7 +272,7 @@ then
 	    echo "Compiling ${VERSION} Linux"
 	    echo ""
 	    ./bin/gbuild -j ${proc} -m ${mem} --commit bitcoin=${COMMIT} --url bitcoin=${url} ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
-	    ./bin/gsign -p $signProg --signer $SIGNER --release ${VERSION}-linux --destination ../gitian.sigs/ ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
+	    ./bin/gsign -p "$signProg" --signer $SIGNER --release ${VERSION}-linux --destination ../gitian.sigs/ ../bitcoin/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-linux.yml
